    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectDialog

        public ProjectDialog(Frame owner,
                     Path initialProjectPath,
                     ProjectDialog.DialogMode mode)
        Dialog for selecting and running a project workflow for the Paint application.

        This dialog allows the user to choose a project root directory (and image directory if applicable), select experiments, optionally configure square-generation parameters, and then execute a callback for one of the supported modes: TRACKMATE, GENERATE_SQUARES, or VIEWER.

    • Method Detail

      • setCalculationCallback

        public void setCalculationCallback(ProjectDialog.CalculationCallback callback)
        Sets the callback to be invoked when the user confirms and starts the operation.
        Parameters:
        callback - a ProjectDialog.CalculationCallback instance that performs the configured workflow.

      • showDialog

        public void showDialog()
        Displays the dialog. The method blocks until the user closes the dialog.

        After closing, the configured Project is returned, regardless of whether the user pressed OK or cancelled.

      • isCancelled

        public boolean isCancelled()
        Returns whether the user cancelled the dialog (or closed it without confirming).
        Returns:
        true if cancelled or closed without confirmation; false otherwise.

      • getDialog

        public JDialog getDialog()

      • setOkEnabled

        public void setOkEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the OK button of the dialog.
        Parameters:
        enabled - if true, the OK button is enabled; if false, disabled.

      • isSweepSelected

        public boolean isSweepSelected()
        Returns whether the “Sweep” mode checkbox is selected.

        Only meaningful when mode is TRACKMATE; otherwise returns false.

        Returns:
        true if sweep mode is selected; false otherwise.

      • isCancelledOrInterrupted

        public boolean isCancelledOrInterrupted()
